title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 3 Scholar Program is designed to reinforce academic discipline while encouraging higher-order thinking. Fully aligned with your child’s school curriculum, we cover every subject, test, assignment, and project while making room for creativity, curiosity, and personalized support. Students explore more complex texts, real-life application of math and science, and develop strong writing and comprehension skills.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Maths, EVS, Science (Intro), Social Studies, GK, Moral Education, and Creative Arts.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Full alignment with school-given projects, homework, and syllabus topics
- Creative academic activities that build conceptual clarity and imagination
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard to track academic and emotional growth
- Merit Badges for reading, academic discipline, project work, and leadership
- Encourages both academic excellence and holistic personality development

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
In Class 3, CodeVoyagers takes a leap into structured computational thinking and basic block-based coding using platforms like Scratch Jr. Students also explore basic digital design, flowcharts, and logical problem-solving using real-world examples. They begin seeing tech as a creative tool, not just a screen.

The goal is to develop future-ready digital thinkers with strong logic and imagination.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Hands-on pre-coding logic, Scratch-style drag-and-drop programming, digital puzzles
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault with multi-level challenges and visual problem sets
- Mini projects like digital storyboards, simple game logic, and animation basics
- Parent+Child Dashboard to track progress in creativity, coding, and logic
- Sets the base for AI, data science, and future Olympiad-level tech fluency

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
The Class 3 Communicators program enhances spoken clarity, structured writing, and reading fluency. Children practice grammar, story writing, picture description, reading comprehension, and participate in public speaking activities. Pronunciation, accent training, and confident expression are integrated in every lesson.

Students also begin building multilingual flexibility through language fusion tools like Duolingo.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Public speaking, show-and-tell, poetry, storytelling, and reading aloud with fluency
- Sentence expansion, creative writing, grammar tools, and story building
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! video tasks to improve stage skills and speech fluency
- Optional multi language training - may it be French, German, or any other
- Builds real-world communication skills, academic English, and presentation confidence

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
Class 3 MathMagicians focus on conceptual math, reasoning, and practical application. Through hands-on activities and kits, learners explore multi-digit operations, fractions, shapes, and data interpretation in fun, real-life scenarios. Children solve not just sums — but real problems.

The emphasis is on understanding math in daily life — from money and time to cooking, travel, and planning.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Coverage of multi-digit addition/subtraction, intro to multiplication, measurements, and patterns
- Brain Gym with mental math, logic games, and real-world calculation activities
- Real-life projects: budget games, shape hunt, family shopping lists, and more
- Merit Badges for accuracy, application, and creativity in solving problems
- Helps children develop strong math confidence and Olympiad-readiness
